entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or rain beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
